tool_description: Movie showtimes for Cinemas NOS (portuguese movie theaters)
name: Movie Showtimes
title: Movie Showtimes

api_list.name: /api/all
api_list.description: Get all the sessions for all the available movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/information
api_list.description: Get the sessions for the specified movie (IMDb id)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api/information/tt6105098"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com/api/information/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-showtimes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
